languages.text: "Хватит меня на покой отправлять, госпожа Тласс. Быть захороненным здесь почетно, но я бы предпочел упокоиться на Даргонусе, поближе к семье".

"Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."
languages.original_text: "Хватит меня на покой отправлять, госпожа Тласс. Быть захороненным здесь почетно, но я бы предпочел упокоиться на Даргонусе, поближе к семье".

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Tlass, if you would please stop trying to send me into an early retirement. To be interred here is an honour, but I would rather find rest on Dargonus, closer to family."
"Mistress Tlass, if you would please stop trying to send me into an early retirement. To be interred here is an honour, but I would rather find rest on Dargonus, closer to family."
"Mistress Tlass, if you would kindly stop trying to send me into an early retirement. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather find rest on Dargonus, closer to family."
"Mistress Tlass, if you would kindly stop trying to send me into an early retirement. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather find rest on Dargonus, closer to family."

"Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

"Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

"Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

languages.text: "Herrin Tlass, ich möchte darum bitten, dass Ihr mich nicht behandelt, als würde ich an der Schwelle des Todes stehen. Hier bestattet zu werden, wäre eine große Ehre, doch ich würde eine letzte Ruhestätte auf Dargonus vorziehen, näher an meiner Familie."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

traits.locale_text: "Herrin Tlass, ich möchte darum bitten, dass Ihr mich nicht behandelt, als würde ich an der Schwelle des Todes stehen. Hier bestattet zu werden, wäre eine große Ehre, doch ich würde eine letzte Ruhestätte auf Dargonus vorziehen, näher an meiner Familie."

languages.text: « Maîtresse Tlass, je vous saurais gré de bien vouloir cesser de vous adresser à moi comme si j'étais à l'article de la mort. Reposer ici serait un grand honneur, mais j'aime autant être inhumé sur Dargonus, aux côtés de ma famille. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

traits.locale_text: « Maîtresse Tlass, je vous saurais gré de bien vouloir cesser de vous adresser à moi comme si j'étais à l'article de la mort. Reposer ici serait un grand honneur, mais j'aime autant être inhumé sur Dargonus, aux côtés de ma famille. »

languages.text: «Maestra Tlass, agradecería que dejara de tratarme como si estuviera al borde de la muerte. Ser sepultado aquí sería un gran honor, pero preferiría que mi lugar de descanso estuviera en Dargonus, cerca de mi familia».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

traits.locale_text: «Maestra Tlass, agradecería que dejara de tratarme como si estuviera al borde de la muerte. Ser sepultado aquí sería un gran honor, pero preferiría que mi lugar de descanso estuviera en Dargonus, cerca de mi familia».

languages.text: 「トラス様、私を死の門戸に立たせるような扱いはやめてください。ここに埋葬されるのは名誉ですが、私はダルゴナス家の近くで永眠したいのです」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

traits.locale_text: 「トラス様、私を死の門戸に立たせるような扱いはやめてください。ここに埋葬されるのは名誉ですが、私はダルゴナス家の近くで永眠したいのです」

languages.text: “如果你能不再把我当成一只脚迈进棺材里的老人，我将不胜感激，特拉斯女士。尽管能埋葬在这里是无上的荣耀，但我更希望能在达戈努斯长眠，离我的家人近一些。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

traits.locale_text: “如果你能不再把我当成一只脚迈进棺材里的老人，我将不胜感激，特拉斯女士。尽管能埋葬在这里是无上的荣耀，但我更希望能在达戈努斯长眠，离我的家人近一些。”

languages.original_text: "Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."

languages.text: "Üstat Tlass, bana sürekli ölüm kapımızı çalıyormuş gibi davranmazsan memnun olurum. Burada defnedilmek büyük bir onur olsa da ebedî istirahat mekânımın Dargonus'ta, ailemin yakınında olmasını yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Tlass, I would appreciate it if you would stop treating me as if I were at death's door. To be interred here would be a high honour, but I would rather my final resting place be on Dargonus, closer to my family."
